content.rendered:
Creator Quinta Brunson

Directed by Randall Einhorn. Jay Karas . Shahrzad Davani

Written by Quinta Brunson. Brian Rubenstein. Jordan Temple. Brittani Nichols. Ava Coleman. Kate Peterman. Justin Tan. Joya McCrory

Cast .Quinta Brunson. Tyler James Williams. Janelle James. Lisa Ann Walter. Chris Perfetti. Sheryl Lee Ralph. William Stanford Davis. Zack Fox. Lela Hoffmeister. Reggie Hayes . Iyana Halley. Larry Owens . Ambrit Millhouse

Language English

Producers Randall Einhorn . Justin Halpern. Patrick Schumacker . Quinta Brunson

Production Delicious Non-Sequitur . Fifth Chance. 20th Television. Warner Bros. Television Studios.

Certificate 13+

Official site Hulu

Season 2

Episodes 3
